import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { KTSVG, toAbsoluteUrl } from '_metronic/helpers' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { actions } from '../../redux/OrdersRedux' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import { Modal, Form, FormGroup, Input, Label } from "reactstrap" import { useSelector, shallowEqual } from 'react-redux' import { RootState } from 'setup' import { Group } from '../../models/Order' import { addorderv2 } from '../../redux/OrdersCRUD' import {randomString} from "react-inlinesvg/lib/helpers"; type Props = { show: boolean close: () => void } const AddManualModal: React.FC = ({ show, close }) => { const role: string = useSelector(({ auth }) => auth.user?.role, shallowEqual) as string || "" const username: string = useSelector(({ auth }) => auth.user?.username, shallowEqual) as string || "" const balance: number = useSelector(({ auth }) => auth.user?.balance, shallowEqual) as number || 0 const adding: boolean = useSelector(({ orderdone }) => orderdone.adding, shallowEqual) as boolean || false const groups: Group[] = useSelector(({ orderdone }) => orderdone.groups, shallowEqual) as Group[] || [] const dispatch = useDispatch() const [maxthreads, setMaxthreads] = useState(100) const [videoid, setVideoid] = useState("") const [homerate,setHome_rate]=useState(0) // const [searchrate,setSearch_rate]=useState(80) const [suggestrate,setSuggest_rate]=useState(0) const [directrate,setDirect_rate]=useState(20) // const [likerate,setLike_rate]=useState(25) const [commentrate,setComment_rate]=useState(25) const [mobilerate,setMobile_rate]=useState(0) // const [note, setNote] = useState("") const [viewstart, setViewstart] = useState(0) const [timebuff, setTimebuff] = useState(4000) const [optionbuff, setOptionbuff] = useState(0) const [enabled,setEnabled]=useState(1) const [user,setUser]=useState(username) const [list_order,setList_Todo]=useState([{ id:"0000000000", videoid:"", state:"" },]) const dismissModal = () => { dispatch(actions.clearcurrentOrder()) } const submit = () => { if (videoid.trim() === "") { alert("VideoId không để trống!") return } if(homerate+searchrate+suggestrate+directrate !=100){ alert("Tổng nguồn view không đúng!") return } const videoidlist=videoid.split('\n') for (var i = 0; i < videoidlist.length; i++) { let video = videoidlist[i] setTimeout(() => { addorderv2(video, homerate, note, directrate, commentrate, mobilerate, searchrate, enabled, maxthreads, viewstart, likerate, suggestrate, timebuff, optionbuff, user) .then((data: any) => { if (data.data.videobuffh == "true") { let orderitem = { id: randomString(10), videoid: video, state: "done" } setList_Todo([...list_order, orderitem]) list_order.push(orderitem) } else { let orderitem = { id: randomString(10), videoid: video, state: data.data.videobuffh } setList_Todo([...list_order, orderitem]) list_order.push(orderitem) } }) .catch(() => { let orderitem = { id: randomString(10), videoid: video, state: 'error' } setList_Todo([...list_order, orderitem]) list_order.push(orderitem) }) }, 1000) } //getcounts() dispatch(actions.addOrderManualRequest({ videoid, homerate, note, directrate, commentrate, mobilerate, searchrate, enabled, maxthreads, viewstart, likerate, suggestrate, timebuff, optionbuff, user })) } useEffect(() => { if (!adding) { close() } }, [adding]) return (
Thêm nhiệm vụ với danh sách VideoId
setVideoid(e.target.value)} />

Nguồn view tổng = 100%

setHome_rate(parseInt(e.target.value))} type="number" /> setSearch_rate(parseInt(e.target.value))} type="number" /> setSuggest_rate(parseInt(e.target.value))} className="form-control form-control-solid" placeholder="ví dụ : 1000" type="number" /> setDirect_rate(parseInt(e.target.value))} className="form-control form-control-solid" placeholder="ví dụ : 1000" type="number" />

Cài đặt tương tác

setLike_rate(parseInt(e.target.value))} type="number" /> setComment_rate(parseInt(e.target.value))} type="number" /> setMobile_rate(parseInt(e.target.value))} type="number" /> setMaxthreads(parseInt(e.target.value))} type="number" /> setTimebuff(parseInt(e.target.value))} type="number" />
setNote(e.target.value)} type="text" />
setOptionbuff(parseInt(e.target.value))} className="form-control form-control-solid" type="select" value={optionbuff} > setEnabled(parseInt(e.target.value))} className="form-control form-control-solid" type="select" value={enabled} >
) } export default AddManualModal
